string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v85
@array/v84

string-array.name: v85
string-array.item: eightysix — STABLE
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Remove unused vector drawables
Update Mms overlay
Enlarge Power Menu Icon in QS Header (Supported ROMs only)
Fix Heads Up QS Header icon (Supported ROMs only)
Fix Google Play Music black on black Settings
Revamp Progress Circle Algorithm

string-array.name: v84
string-array.item: eightythree — eightyfive
Configure in-app fab to reroute directly to ThemeChooser entry of Dark Material!
Configure in-app Play Store link to new Play Developer Website!
Removed Setting\'s dimensions
Add AOSP Email Theme Overlay
Update scrubber for old theme styles, to remove outline under circle
Theme progress spinners for all theme styles
Add heads up icon for status bar (Supported ROMs only)
Add stroke to volume panel icons
Update task manager task close icon
Update new reference to GPS icon in status bar
Update Facebook Messenger Overlay to latest update
Retheme AudioFX Overlay (using my new CyanogenMod commits)
Fix Contacts dropdown arrow button
Clean out cdt base activator folders
Change volume dialog background color to toast background color
Update Benzo Rom Settings Icons
Add letter tile colors to Mms, thanks to @markbencze
Theme Stickers and Drawings for Hangouts
Enlarge SystemUI recents clear all FAB, redoing an HD version
Final clean up: Repulling/syncing with Github sources to clear out unused files, empty folders and temporary files.
